channel.title: Kolibri.net.C64Sorter
channel.description: Knew nothing about UE2 till i got it. Now I love it!. Put up these links for hopefully covering linking to inspiering project and to greet and such.

item.title: Gideon's Logic
item.description: Gideon made this all posssible. Credis is very much due, and his work makes it all possible. Cudos is what this man gets. Greatness.

item.title: U64 Streamer
item.description: Spent so many hours creating this, coudld not do it.So please give this guys their credit. Great images of how it works too....

item.title: UltimateRemote
item.description: Started this project before I realized someone else beat me to it Credis is due I suppose.

item.title: ultimate64-manager
item.description: What the hell, more like this.

item.title: Ultimate Remote
item.description: Credits due, did not know that.

item.title: Ultimate users guide
item.description: Cudos,Users Guide. Ist just so incredible.

item.title: Lemon 64 - Love this site
item.description: Lemon64 runs on passion. And money. Donate!

item.title: Peeks and POKES for the commodore 64
item.description: A DATA BECKER BOOK BY H.J. LIESERT

item.title: Uranus Garage - Karate Warriors (KWR)
item.description: Beauty of it all. I used to be in a 'group', never was accredited for it, i swapped for Dominators among others, and befriended Matcham. I was a nobody, alas...

item.title: Bryggelogg
item.description: Bryggelogg. We make awesome amount of liters annually.

item.title: Ultimate64
item.description: Rust library and command line interface for communicating with Ultimate-64 and Ultimate-II+ devices using the REST API. The library is used in the Ultimate Manager GUI application.

item.title: the C-64 Scene Database
item.description: A site dedicated to gathering as much information as possible about the productions, the groups, the sceners, the events and bbs's in the Commodore 64 scene. You can help this database grow by submitting information about the productions/groups/sceners/events/bbs you know about. In order to do that you first need to create an account. For more info about the CSDb check the docs.
